Quickstrike:




Quickstrike watched Lightmare, slowly stepping out of the lake. It was 
cooling off now, the way he liked it. He stepped to the side, eyeing her. It 
was about time he'd go back to the cave.

"Yeah, ah'll be an optic out. But ah'm sure he can handle himself." he said 
into his comm-link to Dark Mouse.
